description: Fennel and orange salad is a popular Sicilian recipe. In our recipe we have added creamy goat's cheese for extra flavour and texture.Â
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Fennel, Orange & Goats Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the fennel into thin strips using a mandoline. Cut 2 of the oranges into segments.
Whisk the olive oil, orange juice and vinegar together in a medium bowl and tip the sliced red onions in. Steep for 5 minutes.
Mix the leaves, fennel and orange segments in a large bowl, tip in the dressing and onions and toss to coat. Mix in the pecans and goats cheese and serve.
